sys_script_include.name: GetTechnicianSysID

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_bf72462d833ac6103fcc9cc0deaad344
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1284052_consol_0.GetTechnicianSysID</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetTechnicianSysID</name><script><![CDATA[var GetTechnicianSysID = Class.create();
GetTechnicianSysID.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	GetTechnicianSysID: function() {
		var userSysID = this.getParameter('sys_id');
		var technicianSysId = '';

		var technicianGR = new GlideRecord('x_1284052_consol_0_technician');
		technicianGR.addQuery('user_name',userSysID);
		technicianGR.query();

		if (technicianGR.next()) {
			technicianSysId = technicianGR.getUniqueValue();
		}
		return technicianSysId;
	},

    type: 'GetTechnicianSysID'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Rolando.Garza</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-14 22:52:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>bf72462d833ac6103fcc9cc0deaad344</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetTechnicianSysID</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Consolidated Aircraft Logistics Management System" source="x_1284052_consol_0">62a761f4832242103fcc9cc0deaad379</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Consolidated Aircraft Logistics Management System">62a761f4832242103fcc9cc0deaad379</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_bf72462d833ac6103fcc9cc0deaad344</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Rolando.Garza</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-14 22:52:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
